channel.title: Ultrasound Therapy – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: LIPOMED
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The new Lipomed, is a really effective, non-invasive and totally painless instrument. It allows to treat the most common imperfections due to cellulite and fat accumulation. The new portable design and the graphic menu have been studied for the Home – domestic use and makes it userfriendly even for non experienced users. As this ultrasound is portable and compact, can be used in all the operative situations: at home, in the office, on holiday. Lipomed is the best method to treat effectively skin imperfections sush as CELLULITE and the facial WRINKLES, but also numerous PATAOLOGIES.  Delay and combat the wrinkles  Reactivate local circulation and reduce the localized fat  To get rid of orange peel  Increase the tone and texture of the tissues  Treated skin appears more relaxed and smooth  Pain relief  For the main osteoarticular pathology
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Total Peak of the power: 2.5 W total ±20%
Medium Power /cm2: 0.5 W/cm2 ±20%
Head diameter: Ø mm 30
Power supply: Mains 230V 50/60 Hz
Size: 16 x 4.5 x 4.5 cm
Emission frequency: 1 MHz ±5%
Emission: continuous and pulsed
Device Class I type BF
It complies with directive 93/42/CEE
Device CE 0434

EQUIPMENT
1 box
1 ultrasound Lipomed
1 Gel flask
1 mains adapter
1 operating manual

item.title: MEDISOUND 1000
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: THE NEW PROFESSIONAL RANGE has been studied for the most demanding professionals and it satisfies all the new requests both in terms of technical features and management software. The new design has been studied for the use in physiotherapeutic centers and in the hospitals, reassuming both aesthetical and ergonomic concepts  Very easy to use  Wide backlight display  Pre-inserted programs  Programmable  30 FREE PROGRAMS Possibility to freely program and save 30 programs
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Power: 3 W/cm2 (+/- 20%)
Contact management: yes
Output: 1 – Head: 1 x Ø mm 42 – IP68
Power supply: main or rechargeable
batteries (OPTIONAL)
Dimensions: 17 x 22 x 6 cm
Backlight Display
Duty Cycle: 10% – 100% step 10%
Emission: continue and pulsed
Emission Frequency: 1 MHz
Class II A medical device

1 ultrasound Medisound 1000
1 Power Pack
1 cable for power supply
1 head
1 contact gel bottle

item.title: MEDISOUND 922
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: US: 16 Pain/Rehab, 3 Skin, 4 Beauty; Sonophoresis; 13 MENS; 14 Combined (US + MENS) The new Medisound 922 is a really effective, non-invasive and totally painless instrument. Medisound 922 is a state-of-art ultrasound. The use of Ultrasounds in the medical and aesthetic field has been successfully experimented since the 70’s. Medisound 922 is an essential product for all the family. Medisound 922 is supplied with a double graphic display so the programs can be seen in the both sides of the product, and it makes the use and the control of the device more simple in all the positions, the patient has just to scroll the head on the interested body area. Medisound 922 is powered by mains power supply, and can also be used as electrostimulator. Thanks to this function the patient can make use of a complete range for the pain treatment (MENS). Medisound 922 can also be used with the COMBO function, using synergically the pain killer and the antalgic ultrasound and Mens therapies. Medisound 922 is the best product to treat effectively numerous PATHOLOGIES, but also to get rid of skin imperfections such as CELLULITE and the facial WRINKLES. -ULTRASOUND: 22 PROGRAMS PAIN/REHABILITATION: SCIATICA, LOW BACK PAIN, ARTHRITIS/ ARTHROSIS, NEURALGIA, HEMATOMAS, SCARS, CARPAL TUNNEL, EPICONDYLITIS, PERIARTHRITIS, SPRAIN, HEEL PAIN, MYALGIA, TENDINITIS , ARTICULAR-MUSCLE PAIN, UPPER LIMBS PAIN, LOWER LIMBS PAIN. SKIN: WRINKLES, STRETCH MARKS, ACTIVE INGREDIENT ABSORTION. BEAUTY: CELLULITE, ADIPOSE TISSUE, DRAIN, MASSAGE. -SONOPHORESIS -MENS: 13 PROGRAMS PAIN/TENS: GENERICAL PAIN, ARTHRITIS/ ARTHROSIS PAIN, MUSCULAR PAIN, NEURALGIA, KNEE, TRAPEZIUS, THIGH, SHOULDER, ELBOW, HIP PAIN, SCIATICA, LOW BACK PAIN, CERVICALS. -COMBO (ULTRASOUND + MENS): 14 PROGRAMS PAIN/MENS: MUSCLE PAIN, NEURALGIA, KNEE, TRAPEZIUS, THIGH, SHOULDER, ELBOW, HIP PAIN, SCIATICA, LOW BACK PAIN, CERVICALS, RHEUMATIC PAIN, KNEE OSTEOARTHRITIC PAIN, PHANTOM LIMB PAIN.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: MEDISOUND pro II
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: THE NEW PROFESSIONAL RANGE has been studied for the most demanding professionals and it satisfies all the new requests both in terms of technical features and management software. The new design has been studied for the use in physiotherapeutic centers and in the hospitals, reassuming both aesthetical and ergonomic concepts  Very easy to use  Wide backlight display  Pre-inserted programs  Programmable  18 Pre-inserted programs  1 Customizable program Possibility to create a program with parameters that the user can freely choose (non-storable)

2000mA/h
